title: LEVOIT Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Stick Vac with Tangle-Resistant Design, Up to 50 Minutes, Powerful Suction, Rechargeable, Lightweight, and Versatile for Carpet, Hard Floor, Pet Hair, LVAC-200
description: 𝗠𝗲𝗲𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗟𝗩𝗔𝗖-𝟮𝟬𝟬: 𝗟𝗲𝘃𝗼𝗶𝘁'𝘀 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗱 𝗖𝗼𝗿𝗱𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗦𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗸 𝗩𝗮𝗰𝘂𝘂𝗺 𝗖𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗻𝗲𝗿 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗔𝗻𝘁𝗶-𝗛𝗮𝗶𝗿 𝗪𝗿𝗮𝗽! Say goodbye to annoying hair wrap and hello to quicker cleanups with professional-grade tangle resistance. Get busy living, not cleaning.  Note:  𝟭. 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗥𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗰𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: We recommend replacing the filter every three months for optimal performance. Official replacement filters are available in our store, or you can search for "Levoit lvac-200 filter" to get genuine filters. 𝟮. 𝗕𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗥𝘂𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲: The battery provides a runtime of 12 to 50 minutes, depending on the selected mode. You can get additional genuine white batteries in our store to extend your cleaning sessions. 𝟯. 𝗗𝗿𝘆 𝗠𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀 𝗢𝗻𝗹𝘆: This vacuum is designed for dry messes only and should not be used to clean up wet spills or liquids. 𝟰. 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲: If you experience any issues with the product, please feel free to contact us directly! Our contact details can be found in the user manual, and our customer service team will respond within 24 hours.
